US.name: special chars convert in generating .model file
US.Description:
ADescription: Currently KOARTE/CCKOALA generates the content to model file without considering converting the special characters: "&", ">", "<", "'", """. These characters should be converted as it's in xml structure thus ITK/DA/extension adaptation can correctly read and parse it.
Solution: Add the convertion for these chars during outputing the contents to model file.
Changed file: koacfgXMLFileWriter_c.pm
